title: Bellini granita
time: Takes 20 minutes to make, plus freezing
description: Turn a timeless cocktail into a sensational dessert with this bellini granita recipe.
ingredients: 2 x 400g cans peaches in natural juice

method.Step 1: Drain the peaches, reserving 100ml of the juice. Put the juice and sugar in a small pan over a low heat. Stir to dissolve the sugar, then increase the heat and boil for 1 minute. Set aside to cool.

method.Step 2: Put the peaches, lemon juice and peach sugar syrup into a blender and pur√©e until smooth. Stir in the Prosecco and pour into a shallow, freezerproof container. Cover and freeze for 2 hours, then gently scrape the frozen edges into the centre using a fork. Freeze for a further 30 minutes and repeat 2-3 times, until you have a frozen, grainy mixture.

method.Step 3: To serve, transfer to the fridge for 5 minutes, then fork over again. Divide between bowls, pour over a little more Prosecco and decorate with crystallised rose petals, if you like.
